data.text: Zuwa alyo Debola na Balaka, mwana mlume wa Abinoamu, nawemba lwimbo alu.
“Kwa vila vilongozi nawalawa ne lunhwinhwi kulongoza Isilaeli,
Mhulichize, hemwe wandewa!
Mkulu Nguluwi, loulawile kuli vidunda vya Seili,
Vidunda navitigasika hali Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa Sinai,
“Kuli mazuwa ga Shamugali, mwana mlume wa Anati,
Walimi nawaleka kukola mijito,
Waisilaeli lowehagule milungu jinji,
Heni ndanguwahulichiza vilongozi wa Isilaeli,
“Muwikule mbuli, hemwe mlingukwina midogowi mizelu,
Mhulichize! Wanhu wawele kuli ideho lya mazi,
‘Ulilimche, ulilimche, Debola!
“Vilongozi waponile nawadulika,
Kulawa Efulaimu nawadulika hewo wawele nawalawila Amaleki,
Wakulu wa Isakali nawali hamwe na Debola,
Wanhu wa Lubeni, lekachoni hemwe namikalisa kuli mibani ja ming'holo,
Nhanzi ya Gadi nayali kumwambu mwa lwanda lwa Yolodani,
Ila wanhu wa Sebuluni na Nafutali hawadumbile kubagama,
“Wandewa nawoya na kitowa ngondo,
Nhondwe kulawa kilanga nazihanza kuli ngondo,
Kumema kwa mazi ga lwanda lwa Kishoni nakuwahilika kutali,
Hamba kwato za falasi nazitowa ng'hatu hasi,
Mhilisi wa Mkulu Nguluwi nakalonga, ‘Muupanjile muji wa Melosi,
“Kotambichizwa Yaeli kusinda wadala weng'ha,
Nakalanda mazi hela, ila nakamha matombo.
Nakagolola moko wa heye wa kumoso nakebata chigingi,
Sisela nakenamiza hali magulu ga heye, nakagwa na kuwasa tulu.
“Mayake Sisela nakasunjilila hali itubuli,
Wadala wa heye wawele na nyhala nawamwidichila.
‘Ndaze, hawawele na vinhu kulawa kuli ngondo na kigawila,
“Wabagame wang'honyo wa hegwe weng'ha, gwa Mkulu Nguluwi.
